## Welcome

I am a **PhD Candidate in Biostatistics** at Johns Hopkins University (expected May 2026), advised by **Abhirup Datta**. My research focuses on **Bayesian inference**, **variational inference methods with normalizing flows** for large, complex datasets.

- **Research interests:** Bayesian inference · Variational inference · Normalizing flow · Spatial statistics
- **Applications:** Air pollution · Disease mapping · Surveillance data
